Title: THE HASHIM COMMERCIAL & TRADING CO.,plaintiff-appelle,vs.SERAFIN UY PIAOCO,defendant-appellant.
Data:
Republic of the Philippines
SUPREME COURT
Manila


EN BANC


G.R. No. 1114             April 24, 1922


THE HASHIM COMMERCIAL & TRADING CO.,
 plaintiff-appelle,

vs.


SERAFIN UY PIAOCO,
 defendant-appellant.


The appellant in his own behalf.

Crossfiled & O'brien for appellee.


MALCOLM, 
J.:


A frivolous appeal.  Judgement affirmed.  Trebele costs imposed upon appellant. So ordered.


Araullo, C.J., Villamor, Ostrand, Johns and Romualdez, JJ.,
 concur.


Judgment affirmed.
